'''Weathered Bamboo Fence''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Weathered Bamboo Fence is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=80}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=30}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 12h
|Bamboo Segment = 4
|sort = Bamboo Segment
